description: Query a list of domains with pending registrant verification
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Index of the first entry. Default: 0
Query limit (max. number of entries returned)

Sort the list based on the specified parameter. Default order is ascending. Possible values: DOMAIN, X-REGISTRANT-VERIFICATION-EMAIL, X-REGISTRANT-VERIFICATION-STATUS, X-REGISTRANT-VERIFICATION-NAME, X-REGISTRANT-VERIFICATION-REQUESTEDDATE, DOMAINDESC, X-REGISTRANT-VERIFICATION-EMAILDESC, X-REGISTRANT-VERIFICATION-STATUSDESC, X-REGISTRANT-VERIFICATION-NAMEDESC or X-REGISTRANT-VERIFICATION-REQUESTEDDATEDESC
Depth of the list. Default: ALL
Filter result by a specific domain name
